QuestData.Title: Purge the Unclean
QuestData.Description: Do you feel it in the air, $r? The stage is set for us to make things right.$b$bWhile you were busy I was able to track down the elder elemental that rules these waters. Its name is the Azurefall Guardian and it resides within the channels below Tel'anor.$b$bTake the ritual focus, it should help you during the battle.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Defeat the corruption in the Azurefall Guardian.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Use the Cleansing Ritual Focus to find the source of the corruption!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the corruption in the Azurefall Guardian.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find the source of the corruption?
QuestData.RewardText: It is done. Already I can feel the corrupting presence washing away.$b$bThank you, $n. You have done this place a great service.
